title: Goons and Grease Paint: A Short Story Prequel to The Cotton Candy Massacre
description: Before The Cotton Candy Massacre...It was all fun and games till Munroe and Bailey thought they could rip off notorious carnie crime-lord Bonko the Clown. They're about to find out what happens when you clown around with the devil himself. And that's the toot-tootin' truth!Goons and Grease Paint is a scuzzy, violent grindhouse inspired 5000-word short story prequel to The Cotton Candy Massacre.
author: Christopher  Robertson
